        pointer-events: none;

        display: none;

        vertical-align: top;
    }
    .headerCarousel .views-field-nothing{
    display:none;
    }
    a.no-link{pointer-events:none;}
    .page-node-type-video.detail-page .layout-content .block h2 a{
    color: #010101;
    }
    #toolbar-administration{
    display:none;
    }
    .linkList a {
        color: #f82d93;
    }
    #block-views-block-new-music-block-1 .views-field-body{
    
        font-size: 18px;
        text-align: left;
        font-family: "mr-eaves-xl-modern",sans-serif;
    }
    #block-views-block-new-music-block-1 .views-field-body a{
    color:#000;
    }
    #block-views-block-new-music-block-1 .views-field-body a:hover{
    color:#f82d93;
    }

    display: none;
    }
    a{
    text-decoration: none;
    }

    max-width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    }

    vertical-align: top;
    display: inline-block;
    }
    #twitter-widget-0{
    width: 60px;
    height: 20px;
    }
    
    /************ common stylings **************/
    
    /*Pagination styles*/
    .pager__items{
        font-size: 16px;
    }
    .pager ul li.pager__item {
        display: inline-block;
        width: auto;
        border: none;
        color: #00111d;
        margin: 40px 0;
        margin-top: 20px;
       padding: 0.5em;
    }
    
    .pager ul li.pager__item a {
        color: #00111d;
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 15.64px;
        font-family: "modesto-text",serif;
    }
    
    .pager ul li.pager__item a:hover{
        color: #ff2942;
    }
    
    .pager ul li.pager__item.is-active a,
    .pager ul li.pager__item.pager__item--next a,
    .pager ul li.pager__item.pager__item--previous a {
        color: #ff2942;
    }
    
    .pager ul li.pager__item.pager__item--next a:hover,
    .pager ul li.pager__item.pager__item--previous a:hover {
        color: #00111d;
    }
    
    /*.pager ul li.pager__item.pager__item--last,
    .pager ul li.pager__item.pager__item--first {
        display: none;
    }*/
    
    @media only screen and (max-width:767px){
        .pager ul li.pager__item a{
            font-size: 14px;
        }
        .pager ul li.pager__item{
            margin: 10px 0 25px;
            padding: 0 2px;
        }
        .pager ul li.pager__item.pager__item--next a, .pager ul li.pager__item.pager__item--previous a{
            font-size: 14px;
        }
        .view-id-news_view.view-display-id-page_7 ul li.pager__item, .view-id-news_view.view-display-id-page_5 ul li.pager__item {
            padding: 5px;
        }
        .view-id-news_view.view-display-id-page_7 ul li.pager__item.pager__item--ellipsis {
            display: none;
        }
        .view-id-news_view.view-display-id-page_7 ul li.pager__item a, .view-id-news_view.view-display-id-page_5 ul li.pager__item a {
            font-size: 11px;
        }
    }
    
    
    
    /************* Detail page common stylings  **************/
    
    .path-node.detail-page .item-list.detailpages{
        margin-top: 40px;
    }
    .path-node.detail-page .layout-content .block h2{
        margin: 0;
        font-family: 'modestow01-mediumtextregular';
        font-size: 40px;
        color: #010001;
            text-transform: capitalize;
    }
    .path-node.detail-page .item-list.detailpages .views-field-title {
        margin-bottom: 20px;
    }
    .path-node.detail-page .layout-content .comment-wrapper,
    .path-node.detail-page .layout-content .view-comments-recent{
        margin-top: 75px;
    font-size: initial;
    }
    .path-node.detail-page .tourArchiveCategoryStylings{
        margin-top: 20px;
    }
    article.contextual-region.node.node--type-product.node--view-mode-full,
    article.contextual-region.node.node--type-photographer.node--view-mode-full,
    article.contextual-region.node.node--type-venue.node--view-mode-full,
    article.contextual-region.node.node--type-song.node--view-mode-full,
    article.contextual-region.node.node--type-band-member.node--view-mode-full,
    .field--name-field-amazon-s3-mp3-url, 
    .field.field--name-field-display-on-homepage-featur, 
    .field.field--name-field-streamos-mp3-url, 
    .field.field--name-field-feature-type,
    article.contextual-region.node.node--type-fan-photo.node--view-mode-full {
        display: none;
    }
    body .detailpages .views-field-title, body .detailpages .views-field-title a {
        font-size: 45px;
        letter-spacing: 0px;

    .mlist-outer-wrapper [type="checkbox"]:not(:checked), .mlist-outer-wrapper [type="checkbox"]:checked {
        position: absolute;
        left: 0;
        width: 14px;
        height: 16px;
        z-index: 10;
        top: 4px;
        opacity: 0;
        cursor: pointer;
        display: inherit;

    .mlist-outer-wrapper input[type="checkbox"] {

    .mlist-outer-wrapper input[type="checkbox"]:not(:checked) + label:before, .mlist-outer-wrapper input[type="checkbox"]:checked + label:before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        left: 0;
        top: 2px;
        width: 12px;
        height: 12px;
        border: 1px solid #333;
        background: transparent;
        border-radius: 0px;
    }
    .mlist-outer-wrapper input[type="checkbox"]:not(:checked) + label:after {
        opacity: 0;
        -moz-transform: scale(0);
        -ms-transform: scale(0);
        -webkit-transform: scale(0);
        transform: scale(0);
    }
    .mlist-outer-wrapper input[type="checkbox"]:not(:checked) + label:after, .mlist-outer-wrapper input[type="checkbox"]:checked + label:after {
        content: '\2713';
        position: absolute;
        top: 1px;
        left: 3px;
        font-size: 12px;
        color: #333;
        transition: all 0.2s;
    }
    .mlist-outer-wrapper input[type="checkbox"]:checked + label:after {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: scale(1);
    }

        /*nav#block-menulinks ul.menu li.menu-item:first-child:hover .view-super-nav,
        nav#block-menulinks ul.menu li.menu-item:nth-child(2):hover .view-super-nav,
        nav#block-menulinks ul.menu li.menu-item:nth-child(4):hover .view-super-nav,

        /*nav#block-menulinks ul.menu li.menu-item:first-child.visible .view-super-nav,
        nav#block-menulinks ul.menu li.menu-item:first-child.visible1 .view-super-nav,
        nav#block-menulinks ul.menu li.menu-item:nth-child(2).visible .view-super-nav,
        nav#block-menulinks ul.menu li.menu-item:nth-child(2).visible1 .view-super-nav,
        nav#block-menulinks ul.menu li.menu-item:nth-child(2).visible .view-super-nav,
        nav#block-menulinks ul.menu li.menu-item:nth-child(4).visible1 .view-super-nav,

                opacity: 1;
        }*/
        
        nav#block-menulinks ul.menu li.menu-item:first-child a:hover +div.view-super-nav,
        nav#block-menulinks ul.menu li.menu-item:nth-child(2) a:hover +div.view-super-nav,
        nav#block-menulinks ul.menu li.menu-item:nth-child(4) a:hover +div.view-super-nav,
        nav#block-menulinks ul.menu li.menu-item:nth-child(5) a:hover +div.view-super-nav,
        .view-super-nav.visible,.view-super-nav:hover{
                visibility: visible;
                opacity: 1;
                transition-delay:0.3s;
        }

    /**************** Carousel Paragraph - CSS ******************/
    
    div#block-views-block-paragraph-view-block-1 {
        overflow: hidden;    
        /*height: calc(79vh - 72px);*/
    }
    .officialCarousel,
    .headerCarousel{
        position: relative;
    }
    .officialCarousel ul li,
    .item-list .headerCarousel li{
        list-style: none;
        margin: 0;
        width: 100%;
        position: relative;
    }
    .headerCarousel .views-field-field-slide-title,
    .headerCarousel .views-field-field-slide-link-url,
    .headerCarousel .views-field-field-slide-d,

        display: none;
    }
    .headerCarousel .views-field-field-slide-background-image img{
        /*height: calc(79vh - 72px);*/
    }
    .headerCarousel .views-field-nothing{
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 23.1%;
        /*height: calc(79vh - 72px);*/
        height: 100%;
    }
    .headerCarousel .views-field-nothing .field-content{
        display: inline-block;
        position: absolute;
        top: 50%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translate(-50%,-50%);
        color: #FFFCF9;
        width: 61%;
        /*word-wrap: break-word;*/
    }
    .headerCarousel .views-field-nothing .field-content .carouselTitle{
            font-family: 'modestow01-mediumtextregular';
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-size: 35px;
        line-height: 45px;
        width: auto;
        margin: 0 0 15px 0;
        text-align: left;
    }
    .headerCarousel .views-field-nothing .field-content .carouselDescription{
        font-size: 18px;
            font-family: "mr-eaves-modern",sans-serif;
            font-weight: 700;
            letter-spacing: 2px;
            text-align: left;
    }
    .headerCarousel .views-field-nothing .field-content .carouselLinks{
            margin-top: 32px;
            width: 232px;
    }

        display: block;
        text-align: center;
        color: #8B0053;
        font-size: 15px;
        text-decoration: none;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
        background: none #FFF;
        height: 40px;
        line-height: 40px;
        border-radius: 5px;
        font-family: "mr-eaves-modern",sans-serif;
        font-weight: 700;
        letter-spacing: 2px;
    }
    
    .officialCarousel .owl-dots,
    .headerCarousel .owl-dots{
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 97px;
    bottom: 24px;
        left: 50%;
        z-index: 10;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
    }
    .officialCarousel .owl-dots{
        bottom: 25px;
    }

    .headerCarousel .owl-dot{

    }

    }

        display: block;

        height: 15px;
        background: #000;
        border-radius: 50%;
        border: 2px solid #000;
        box-sizing: border-box;

    }

    /*********** Generic Third party styles **************/
    
    
        .owl-carousel,
        .owl-carousel .owl-item {
            -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;
            position: relative
        }
    
        .owl-carousel {
            display: none;
            width: 100%;
            z-index: 1
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-stage {
            position: relative;
            -ms-touch-action: pan-Y;
            -moz-backface-visibility: hidden
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-stage:after {
            content: ".";
            display: block;
            clear: both;
            visibility: hidden;
            line-height: 0;
            height: 0
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-stage-outer {
            position: relative;
            overflow: visible1;
            -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-item,
        .owl-carousel .owl-wrapper {
            -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;
            -moz-backface-visibility: hidden;
            -ms-backface-visibility: hidden;
            -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
            -moz-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
            -ms-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0)
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-item {
            min-height: 1px;
            float: left;
            -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;
            -webkit-touch-callout: none
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-item img {
            display: block;
            width: 100%
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-dots.disabled,
        .owl-carousel .owl-nav.disabled {
            display: none !important;
        }
    
        .no-js .owl-carousel,
        .owl-carousel.owl-loaded {
            display: block
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-dot,
        .owl-carousel .owl-nav .owl-next,
        .owl-carousel .owl-nav .owl-prev {
            cursor: pointer;
            cursor: hand;
            -webkit-user-select: none;
            -khtml-user-select: none;
            -moz-user-select: none;
            -ms-user-select: none;
            user-select: none
        }
    
        .owl-carousel.owl-loading {
            opacity: 0;
            display: block
        }
    
        .owl-carousel.owl-hidden {
            opacity: 0
        }
    
        .owl-carousel.owl-refresh .owl-item {
            visibility: hidden
        }
    
        .owl-carousel.owl-drag .owl-item {
            -webkit-user-select: none;
            -moz-user-select: none;
            -ms-user-select: none;
            user-select: none
        }
    
        .owl-carousel.owl-grab {
            cursor: move;
            cursor: grab
        }
    
        .owl-carousel.owl-rtl {
            direction: rtl
        }
    
        .owl-carousel.owl-rtl .owl-item {
            float: right
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .animated {
            animation-duration: 1s;
            animation-fill-mode: both
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-animated-in {
            z-index: 0
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-animated-out {
            z-index: 1
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .fadeOut {
            animation-name: fadeOut
        }
    
        @keyframes fadeOut {
            0% {
                opacity: 1
            }
            100% {
                opacity: 0
            }
        }
    
        .owl-height {
            transition: height .5s ease-in-out
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-item .owl-lazy {
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity .4s ease
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-item img.owl-lazy {
            transform-style: preserve-3d
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-video-wrapper {
            position: relative;
            height: 100%;
            background: #000
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-video-play-icon {
            position: absolute;
            height: 80px;
            width: 80px;
            left: 50%;
            top: 50%;
            margin-left: -40px;
            margin-top: -40px;
            background: url(owl.video.play.png) no-repeat;
            cursor: pointer;
            z-index: 1;
            -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;
            transition: transform .1s ease
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-video-play-icon:hover {
            -ms-transform: scale(1.3, 1.3);
            transform: scale(1.3, 1.3)
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-video-playing .owl-video-play-icon,
        .owl-carousel .owl-video-playing .owl-video-tn {
            display: none
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-video-tn {
            opacity: 0;
            height: 100%;
            background-position: center center;
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
            background-size: contain;
            transition: opacity .4s ease
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-video-frame {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            height: 100%;
            width: 100%
        }
    
        .owl-prev,
        .owl-next {
            font-size: 0;
            color: #670616;
              transform: translateY(-50%);
              -webkit-transform: translateY(-50%);
        }
    
        .owl-nav>div.owl-prev {
            background: url(/sites/g/files/g2000007851/files/Arrow-Left1.png) no-repeat scroll 0 0 #fffefd;
            width: 21px;
            height: 69px;
            background-size: 21px auto;
            text-indent: -9999px;
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 10px;
            vertical-align: middle;
            background-position: center -60px;
        }
    
        .owl-nav>div.owl-next {
            background: url(/sites/g/files/g2000007851/files/Arrow-Right1.png) no-repeat scroll 0 0 #fffefd;
            width: 21px;
            height: 69px;
            background-size: 21px auto;
            text-indent: -9999px;
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 10px;
            vertical-align: middle;
            margin-right: 0;
            background-position: center 10px;
        }
        .owl-nav>div.owl-next:hover{
            background-position: center -60px;
            background-color: #00111d;
        }
        .owl-nav>div.owl-prev:hover {
            background-position: center 10px;
            background-color: #00111d;
        }
        .owl-carousel .owl-item .musicTitle img {
            width: auto;
            text-align: center;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
    
        .owl-prev.disabled,
        .owl-next.disabled {
            display: none;
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-item.active {
            opacity: 1;
            pointer-events: auto;
        }
    
        .owl-carousel .owl-item {
            opacity: 0;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
    
    
    
        body.WhachuKnow .owl-prev:after {
            background: url(../images/arrow-left.png) no-repeat;
            width: 16px;
            height: 30px;
            background-size: 100% auto;
            content: "";
            display: inline-block;
            vertical-align: middle;
            margin-left: 10px;
        }
    
        body.WhachuKnow .owl-next:before {

            background-size: 100% auto;

            display: inline-block;
            vertical-align: middle;
            margin-right: 10px;
        }

            .owl-nav>div {
                width: 146px;

            }

            }
            .owl-prev {
                left: 0%;
                top: 50%;
                text-align: right;
            }
            .owl-next {
                right: 0%;
                top: 50%;

            }*/

function titleCase(string) {
      var sentence = string.toLowerCase().split(" ");
      for(var i = 0; i< sentence.length; i++){
         sentence[i] = sentence[i][0].toUpperCase() + sentence[i].slice(1);
      }
   
   return sentence;
   }
   if(window.location.pathname == "/features/news"){

}

    font-size: 24px;

    font-weight: bold;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}
.tourArchiveSearching .searchGo {
    width: 73px;
    margin-left: 3px;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #FFFEFD;
    height: 44px;
    line-height: 44px;
    border-top-right-radius: 4px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 4px;
    background: rgba(252,40,89,1);
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(252,40,89,1) 0%, rgba(255,41,66,1) 100%);
    background: -webkit-gradient(left top, right top, color-stop(0%, rgba(252,40,89,1)), color-stop(100%, rgba(255,41,66,1)));
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, rgba(252,40,89,1) 0%, rgba(255,41,66,1) 100%);
    background: -o-linear-gradient(left, rgba(252,40,89,1) 0%, rgba(255,41,66,1) 100%);
    background: -ms-linear-gradient(left, rgba(252,40,89,1) 0%, rgba(255,41,66,1) 100%);
    background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(252,40,89,1) 0%, rgba(255,41,66,1) 100%);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#fc2859', endColorstr='#ff2942', GradientType=1 );
}
.commentSearchSearching, .commentSearchSorting {
    font-family: "mr-eaves-modern", sans-serif;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    position: relative;
    display: inline-block;
    vertical-align: middle;
}
.commentSearchSorting .selectedOrder, .commentReset span {
    font-size: 15px;
    color: #F6F3F0;
    background: #00101D;
    display: inline-block;
    vertical-align: middle;
    height: 43px;
    width: 158px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    line-height: 43px;
    cursor: pointer;
    position: relative;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    font-weight: normal;
	text-align: center;
}
.commentSearchSorting .sortlist {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    top: 40px;
    right: 0;
    background: #00101D;
    padding: 8px 0 4px;
    width: 158px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 4px;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 4px;
    z-index: 1;
}
.commentSearchSorting.open .sortlist {
    display: block;
}

.commentReset {
    clear: none;
    display: none;
    margin: 10px 0 0;
    text-align: right;
}

.commentReset span{
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 1px solid;
}

.commentSearchSearchAndSort.showReset .commentReset {
    display: block;
}

.commentReset span:hover{
    text-decoration: none;
    background: #fffefd;
    color: #00111d;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: #00111d;
    border-color: #00111d;
}

.commentSearchSorting .sortlist a {
    display: block;
    padding-bottom: 5px;
    color: #F6F3F0;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    font-weight: normal;
	font-size: 15px;
    text-align: center;
}
.commentSearchSorting.open .selectedOrder .fa-angle-up, .commentSearchSorting .selectedOrder .fa-angle-down {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    top: 7px;
    right: 10px;
    font-size: 25px;
}
.commentSearchSorting.open .selectedOrder .fa-angle-down, .commentSearchSorting .selectedOrder .fa-angle-up {
    display: none;
}
.commentSearchSorting .sortLabel {
    font-size: 15px;
    color: #00111D;
    display: inline-block;
    vertical-align: middle;
    padding-right: 11px;
}
.commentSearchSearchAndSort, .commentSearchSearching, .commentSearchSorting, .commentSearchSearching input,.commentSearchSearching a {
    display:  inline-block;
    vertical-align: top;
}

.commentSearchSearching input {
    border: 1px solid;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-radius: 4px;
    padding: 5px;
    padding-right: 30px;
}
.commentSearchSearchAndSort {
    float: right;
}
.commentSearchSearching {
    margin-right: 20px;
}
.commentSearchSearching a {
    position: absolute;
    right: 10px;
    top: 6px;
    color: #f82d93;
}
body.sorting .commentSearchSorting .selectedOrder {
font-size: 0;
}
.view-comments-recent .view-filters, section.field.field--name-field-dead-comment h2:not(.comment-form__title){
    display: none;
}
body.path-comment.detail-page #comment-form, body.path-comment.detail-page #comment-field-item-comment-delete-form {
    max-width: 800px;
    margin: 50px auto 0;
	font-size: 16px;
    font-family: "myriad-pro",sans-serif;
    color: #00111d;
}
body.path-comment.detail-page .form-textarea-wrapper textarea{
	padding:10px;
}
body.path-comment.detail-page input#edit-submit {
    vertical-align: middle;
}
body.path-comment.detail-page a#edit-cancel {
    color: #f82d93;
    display: inline-block;
    vertical-align: middle;
}
body.path-comment.detail-page a#edit-cancel:hover, body.detail-page .comment-detail-body a:hover, body.detail-page .comment-detail-username a:hover,.filter-help a:hover{
	color:#000;
}
body.path-comment.detail-page form#comment-field-item-comment-delete-form {
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
    font-family: "myriad-pro",sans-serif;
    color: #00111d;
    line-height: normal;
}
.view-comments-recent .view-empty {
    margin-top: 50px;
    display: block;
    overflow: hidden;
}
@media only screen and (max-width:767px){
	.commentSearchSearchAndSort {
		float: none;
		text-align: center;
		margin: 15px 0;
	}
	.commentSearchSearching {
		margin-right: 0;
		margin-bottom: 20px;
	}
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) and (orientation: portrait) {
	.commentReset {
        margin: 10px 0 0 70px;
        text-align: center;
    }
}

         <script>
          $(document).ready(function() {
/* this set of script will make sure not more than one story of same type is displayed in homepage*/
$("li.All.In.The.Family").parents(".item-list").hide();
$("li.Taper039s.Section").parents(".item-list").hide();
$("li.Jam.Of.The.Week").parents(".item-list").hide();
$("li.All.The.Years.Live").parents(".item-list").hide();
$("li.GD.Radio.Hour").parents(".item-list").hide();
$("li.DeadcastFt").parents(".item-list").hide();
$("li.News").parents(".item-list").hide();
$("li.All.In.The.Family").eq(0).parents(".item-list").show();
$("li.Taper039s.Section").eq(0).parents(".item-list").show();
$("li.Jam.Of.The.Week").eq(0).parents(".item-list").show();
$("li.All.The.Years.Live").eq(0).parents(".item-list").show();
$("li.GD.Radio.Hour").eq(0).parents(".item-list").show();
$("li.DeadcastFt").eq(0).parents(".item-list").show();
$("li.News").eq(0).parents(".item-list").show();
	function convertHex(hex, opacity) {
		hex = hex.replace('#', '');
		r = parseInt(hex.substring(0, 2), 16);
		g = parseInt(hex.substring(2, 4), 16);
		b = parseInt(hex.substring(4, 6), 16);
		result = 'rgba(' + r + ',' + g + ',' + b + ',' + opacity + ')';
		return result;
	}

	//Applying bgcolor to content
	$('.headerCarousel li').each(function() {
		var bgColor = $(this).find('.views-field-field-slide-bgcolor').text();
		$(this).find('.views-field-nothing').css('background', convertHex(bgColor, 0.6));
	});

	/*Starting of url query param carousel function*/
	function getUrlVars(){
		var vars = [], hash;
		var hashes = window.location.href.slice(window.location.href.indexOf('?') + 1).split('&');
		for(var i = 0; i < hashes.length; i++)
		{
			hash = hashes[i].split('=');
			vars.push(hash[0]);
			vars[hash[0]] = hash[1];
		}
		return vars;
	}

	var urlVars = getUrlVars();

	if(urlVars.length > 0){
		if(urlVars["from"] != undefined){
			if(urlVars["from"] != "advertisement"){
				jQuery("li.slide-0").remove();
			}
		} 
		else{
			jQuery("li.slide-0").remove();
		}
	}
	else {
		jQuery("li.slide-0").remove();
	}
	/*Ending of url query param carousel function*/

	$('div#block-views-block-paragraph-view-block-1 ul.headerCarousel').owlCarousel({
		loop : true,
		margin : 0,
		nav : true,
		dots : true,
		responsive : {
			0 : {
				items : 1
			}
		}
	});
	$('div#block-views-block-show-block-3 .officialCarousel ul').owlCarousel({
		loop : true,
		margin : 0,
		nav : true,
		dots : true,
		responsive : {
			0 : {
				items : 1
			}
		}
	});

	if ($(window).width() < 768) {
                 $('div#block-views-block-news-view-block-4 .view-id-news_view.view-display-id-block_4 > .view-header > .popularTitle').insertBefore("div#block-views-block-news-view-block-4 .view-id-news_view.view-display-id-block_4 > .view-header");
		setTimeout(function(){$('div#block-views-block-news-view-block-4 .view-id-news_view.view-display-id-block_4 > .view-header').owlCarousel({
			loop : true,
			margin : 0,
			nav : true,
			dots : true,
			responsive : {
				0 : {
					items : 1
				}
			}
		})}, 1000)
                

	}

});
         </script>

            function socialShare() {


	jQuery('.share .fs-fb.social_icons').click(function() {
		var parentDOM = jQuery(this).closest(".item-list");
		//var path = "https://www.dead.net" + parentDOM.find(".custom-share .custom-path").text();
var path = parentDOM.find(".custom-share .custom-path").text();
		var ogimg = parentDOM.find(".custom-share .custom-media img").attr("src");
		var customtitle = parentDOM.find(".custom-share .custom-title").text();
		var custombody = parentDOM.find(".custom-share .custom-body").text();

		var obj = {
			app_id : "876598752549419",
			method : "feed",
			link : path,
			picture : ogimg,
			name : customtitle,
			description : custombody,
			display : "popup"
		};

		FB.ui(obj);
		return false;

	});
	/*jQuery('.share .fs-tw.social_icons').click(function() {
		var parentDOM = jQuery(this).closest(".item-list");
		var path = parentDOM.find(".custom-share .custom-path").text();
		path= "https://www.dead.net" + jQuery.trim(path);
		var customtitle = parentDOM.find(".custom-share .custom-title").text();
		var twitterURL = 'https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?original_referer=' + path + '&text=' + encodeURIComponent(customtitle) + ' ' + encodeURIComponent(path) + '?cmpid=Dead/twitter/tweet-button/Journal-detail &via=Dead';
		jQuery('.share .fs-tw.social_icons a').attr('href', twitterURL);
	});*/
	
	jQuery('.shares a.icon-google-plus').click(function() {
		var parentDOM = jQuery(this).closest(".views-row");
		var path = parentDOM.find(".custom-share .custom-path").text();
		path= "https://www.dead.net" + jQuery.trim(path);
		var customtitle = parentDOM.find(".custom-share .custom-title").text();
		var googleplusURL = 'https://plus.google.com/share?original_referer=' + path + '&text=' + encodeURIComponent(customtitle) + ' ' + encodeURIComponent(path);
		jQuery('.shares a.icon-google-plus').attr('href', googleplusURL);
	});

}


jQuery(document).ready(function() {
	socialShare();
});

jQuery(document).ajaxComplete(function() {
	//socialShare();
});

       <div class="clearfix text-formatted field field--name-body field--type-text-with-summary field--label-hidden field__item">
        <script>
         var closeFlag = 0;
	var parsedFile;
	var timeout;
	jQuery(document).ready(function() {
		var wmgSignUpFormOptions = {
			callBacks : {
				onSuccess : function() {
                                       jQuery('body.lightboxshow .lightbox-wrapper').addClass("second-screen");
					closeFlag++;
					if (closeFlag === 1) {
						clearTimeout(timeout);
					}
					if (closeFlag === 2) {
						setTimeout(hideToaster, 5000);
                                                var date = new Date();
                                                var exdays= 183;
                                                date.setTime(date.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
												//date.setTime(date.getTime() + (2*60*1000));
						$.cookie("turnkeyPassCookie", 1,{ expires: date });
                                               
					}

				}
			}
		}
		wmgSignUpFormOptions.customPageName = digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName + ':Email Sign-up Form:Toaster';
		wmgSignUpFormOptions.validatorSettings = {
			rules : {
				email : {
					required : true,
				},
				country : {
					required : false
				}
			},
			messages : {
				email : {
					required : "Email address is a required field",
					email : "Please enter a valid email address"
				},
				country : {
					required : "Country field is required"
				}
			}
		};
		var pageNameOption = {};
		function OmniPrep(omniVars, description) {
			if ( typeof omniVars === "string") {
				s_dtm.linkTrackVars = 'events';
				s_dtm.linkTrackEvents = omniVars;
				s_dtm.events = omniVars;
			} else {
				s_dtm.linkTrackVars = 'events, linkTrackEvents';
				s_dtm = jQuery.extend(s_dtm, omniVars);
			}
			s_dtm.tl(this, 'o', description);
		}

		function hideToaster() {
			jQuery("#lightBoxContent.lightBoxContent.tkt").removeClass('show_toaster').addClass('hide_toaster');
		}

		function sendOmnitureEvent() {
			var omniVars = {};
			omniVars.events = "event63";
			omniVars.linkTrackEvents = "event63";
			s_account = digitalData.settings.reportSuites;
			var turnkeyLightboxDescription = s_dtm.pageName + ':Email Sign-up Form:Toaster';
			OmniPrep(omniVars, turnkeyLightboxDescription);
		}

		var scrollHandler = function() {
			var maxScroll;
			var scrollValue;
			var timeOutval = parsedFile.field_toaster_timeout;
			var toasterPos = parsedFile.field_toaster_position;
			var displayrate = parsedFile.field_display_rates;
			var tkeyHt = parsedFile.field_turnkey_height;
			maxScroll = jQuery(document).height() - jQuery(window).height();
			console.log(scrollValue);
			jQuery("#lightBoxContent.lightBoxContent.tkt .lightBoxClose.turnKeyClose a").click(function() {
				hideToaster();
				$.cookie("turnkeyPassCookie", 1);

			});
		};
		var s = jQuery("body");
		var pos = s.offset().top;
		jQuery(window).scroll(function() {
			var windowpos = jQuery(window).scrollTop();
			if ($.cookie('turnkeyPassCookie') == null || $.cookie('turnkeyPassCookie') == undefined) {
				if (!(jQuery(".lightbox-overlay").is(':not(:hidden)')) && (windowpos + jQuery(window).height() > jQuery(document).height()-100)) {
					jQuery("#lightBoxContent.lightBoxContent.tkt").removeClass('hide_toaster').addClass('show_toaster');
					var turnkeyLightboxOmniVars = {};
					turnkeyLightboxOmniVars.eVar52 = 'Toaster:Email Sign-up Form';
					turnkeyLightboxOmniVars.events = "event62";
					turnkeyLightboxOmniVars.linkTrackEvents = "event62";
					s_account = digitalData.settings.reportSuites;
					var turnkeyLightboxDescription = digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName + ':Email Sign-up Form:Toaster';
					OmniPrep(turnkeyLightboxOmniVars, turnkeyLightboxDescription);
					jQuery("#tktContainer .lightBoxContent.tkt .submit").click(function() {
						sendOmnitureEvent();
					})
					//s_dtmClearvars();
				} else if (windowpos >= pos) {
					//hideToaster();
				} else {
				if (!(jQuery(".lightbox-overlay").is(':not(:hidden)')) && (windowpos + jQuery(window).height() > jQuery(document).height()-100)) {
					jQuery("#lightBoxContent.lightBoxContent.tkt").removeClass('hide_toaster').addClass('show_toaster');
					}
				}
			} else {
				hideToaster();
			}
		});
		
		if($){
			$('#signupSplash2').wmgSignUpForm(wmgSignUpFormOptions);
		}
		else{
			jQuery('#signupSplash2').wmgSignUpForm(wmgSignUpFormOptions);
		}
		
		jQuery('.turnKeyClose').click(function() {
			hideToaster();
			$.cookie("turnkeyPassCookie", 1);
		});
		jQuery('.termsWrapper1 .terms').on('click', function(e) {
			e.stopPropagation();
			jQuery(this).toggleClass('showing');
			//jQuery(this).parents('#toaster-mail .termsWrapper1').find('.termsContent').slideToggle();
			jQuery(this).parents('.termsWrapper1').find('.termsContent').slideToggle();
			//jQuery('.termsWrapper1 .termsContent').slideToggle();
			e.stopImmediatePropagation();
			e.preventDefault();

		});
		
		
		
	});
        </script>
       </div>
      </div>

      <div class="block block-block-content block-block-content50422c3c-9242-4bd2-a511-e817a2646765" data-block-plugin-id="block_content:50422c3c-9242-4bd2-a511-e817a2646765" id="block-dtmscript">
       <div class="clearfix text-formatted field field--name-body field--type-text-with-summary field--label-hidden field__item">
        <script type="text/javascript">
         var pathname = window.location.pathname;
  var pathArr = pathname.split("/");
  var aliasArgs = pathArr[1];
  var siteName = "Grateful Dead";

  digitalData.page.pageInfo.server = digitalData.content.artist + ":Site";

  if (pathArr.length <= 2) {
    var string = pathArr[1];
    var pageMapping = {
      home: "HomePage",
      news: "News",
      features: "News",
      band: "About:Band Members",
      biography: "About:Biography",
      discography: "About:Discography",
      ephemera: "Archives:Ephemera",
      archives: "Archives",
      music: "Music",
      songs: "Archives:Lyrics",
      forum: "Community",
      community: "Community",
      familylinks: "Family Links",
      "mailing-list": "Mailing List Sign-up",
      "home-onepage-b": "HomePage",
      "not-authorized": "403 Error",
      "page-not-found": "404 Error",
      user: "Login",
      "contact-us": "Contact Us",
      about: "About",
      search: "Search:Results",
      chat: "Chat",
      "music-videos": "Music & Videos",
      terms: "Terms",
      help: "Help",
      digin: "Saint of Circumstance Giants Stadium Out Now:Landing",
      "privacy-policy": "Privacy Policy",
      fireonthemountain: "Fire On The Mountain Video:Landing",
      deadcast: "Podcasts",
      BOT: "Black Out Tuesday Charity Redirect:Landing",
      "30daysofdead":"30 Days of Dead:Fallacq20",
      "30days-alternative-entry":"30 Days of Dead:Entry:Fallacq20"
    };
    var pageNameMapping = {
      home: "HomePage",
      news: "News:Landing",
      features: "News:Landing",
      band: "About:Category",
      biography: "About:Category",
      discography: "About:Category",
      ephemera: "Archives:Category",
      songs: "Archives:Category",
      archives: "Archives:Landing",
      forum: "Community:Landing",
      community: "Community:Landing",
      familylinks: "Family Links:Landing",
      "mailing-list": "Mailing List Sign-up",
      "home-onepage-b": "HomePage",
      "not-authorized": "Error",
      "page-not-found": "Error",
      user: "Login",
      "contact-us": "Contact Us",
      about: "About",
      search: "Search:Results",
      chat: "Chat",
      "music-videos": "music & videos:landing",
      terms: "Terms",
      digin: "Landing Page",
      help: "Help",
      "privacy-policy": "Privacy Policy",
      fireonthemountain: "Landing Page:Video Release",
      "30daysofdead": "Contest:Landing",
      deadcast: "podcasts:landing",
      BOT: "Landing Page:Charity Redirect",
      "30days-alternative-entry":"Contest:Landing"
    };

    digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName = siteName + ":" + pageMapping[string];
    digitalData.page.category.pageType = pageNameMapping[string];

    switch (string) {
      case "page-not-found":
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory = siteName + ":Error";
        break;
      case "not-authorized":
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory = siteName + ":Error";
        break;
      case "":
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory = siteName + ":Home";
        break;
      case "search":
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory = siteName + ":Search";
        break;
      case "band":
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory = siteName + ":About";
        break;
      case "biography":
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory = siteName + ":About";
        break;
      case "discography":
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory = siteName + ":About";
        break;
      case "ephemera":
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory = siteName + ":Archives";
        break;
      case "songs":
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory = siteName + ":Music";
        break;
      case "digin":
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory = siteName + ":Landing Page";
        digitalData.page.category.pageType = "Landing Page:Album Release";
        break;
      case "BOT":
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory = siteName + ":Landing Page";
        digitalData.page.category.pageType = "Landing Page:Charity Redirect";
        break;
      case "user":
        digitalData.page.category.pageType = "authentication:login";
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory =
          siteName + ":" + pageMapping[string];
        break;
      default:
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory =
          siteName + ":" + pageMapping[string];
        break;
    }

    if (pageMapping[string] == undefined) {
      var nodeTitle = document.getElementsByTagName("title")[0].innerText;
      var nodeTitleArr = nodeTitle.split("|");
      nodeTitleArr[0] = nodeTitleArr[0].replace(/-/g, " ");
      digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName = siteName + ":" + nodeTitleArr[0];
      digitalData.page.category.pageType = nodeTitleArr[0];
      digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory =
        siteName + ":" + nodeTitleArr[0];
      //console.log("f"+node);

      if (
        "node" == "features" &&
        "6" != ""
      ) {
        digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName =
          digitalData.content.artist + ":" + "News" + ":" + nodeTitleArr[0];
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory = siteName + ":" + "News";
        digitalData.page.category.pageType = "News:Category";
      }
    }
	
	if(jQuery("body").hasClass("path-frontpage")){
		digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName = siteName + ":HomePage";
        digitalData.page.category.primaryCategory = siteName + ":Home";
        digitalData.page.category.pageType = "homepage";
	}
  } else {
    var string = pathArr[2];
    var nodeTitle = document.getElementsByTagName("title")[0].innerText;
    var nodeTitleArr = nodeTitle.split("|");
    nodeTitleArr[0] = nodeTitleArr[0].replace(/-/g, " ");

    if (
      aliasArgs == "features" &&
      "node" !== "node"
    ) {
      digitalData.page.pageInfo.pageName =
        digitalData.content.artist + ":" + "News" + ":" + nodeTitleArr[0];
